data.eml:eml: Palpi aplenty: new species in the Chrysotus longipalpus species group (Diptera: Dolichopodidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Runyon, Justin B., Capellari, Renato S. (2018): Palpi aplenty: new species in the Chrysotus longipalpus species group (Diptera: Dolichopodidae). Zootaxa 4399 (4): 579-585, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4399.4.8
